headline: Should ARK’s Push Into Deere’s Automation Story Require Action From Deere (DE) Investors?
summary: In recent days, ARK Invest increased its holdings in Deere & Company as it reshaped its innovation-focused ETFs, emphasizing automation in agriculture and construction despite Deere’s reported annual sales declines of 14.5% over the past two years and pressure on returns on capital. This renewed institutional interest highlights how Deere’s push into precision agriculture and autonomous technologies is attracting innovation-focused capital even as its recent operating trends have been...
